content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (x=-13.0, y=-48.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=-15.0, y=-50.0) with a drop position at (x=-14.5, y=-48.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-14.5, y=-48.5) storing extracted iron ore
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-13.0, y=-48.0) fueled by coal and processing iron ore into iron plates
- Additional Stone Furnaces at positions (x=-11.0, y=-48.0) and (x=-9.0, y=-48.0), currently without ingredients to smelt
- Burner Inserters at positions (x=-14.5, y=-46.5) and (x=-14.5, y=-45.5) waiting for source items

### Coal and Iron Ore Extraction Facility at Position (x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (x=41.0, y=-82.0) extracting coal
- Stone Furnace at position (x=43.0, y=-82.0) fueled by coal and processing iron ore into iron plates
- Iron Chest at position (x=41.5, y=-80.5) storing coal
- Burner Inserter at position (x=43.5, y=-80.5) waiting for source items

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Extracting Iron Ore
- Ensure that the wooden chest at position (x=-14.5, y=-48.5) contains iron ore before attempting to extract. Check the inventory of the chest to confirm the presence of iron ore.

### Inserters Waiting for Source Items
- Verify that the source entities for inserters at positions (x=43.5, y=-80.5), (x=-14.5, y=-46.5), and (x=-14.5, y=-45.5) have items available for transfer. Ensure that the production line is not stalled due to a lack of input materials.

### Warnings for Full Chests
- Regularly check and empty the chests at drop positions such as (x=41.5, y=-80.5) and (x=-14.5, y=-48.5) to prevent mining drills from stopping due to full storage.
